name: Status Annotations Plugin
description:
Initial design ideas for a plugin I've been meaning to build to indicate the status of a design.

Version history:
• Publish 9: Clean up, added archive option
• Publish 8: Added user notifications
• Publish 7: Tweaks to UI, added refresh button
• Publish 6: Finalized plugin UI
• Publish 5: Refine plugin UI
• Publish 4: First iterations on plugin UI
• Publish 3: Finalized on-canvas elements
• Publish 2: Refined language, started icon explorations
• Publish 1: Rough sketches, and initial positioning ideas
